<p>Lego sets are probably at the top of your kid&#39;s wish list, and maybe they&#39;re at the top of your personal list, too. With so many to choose from, you&#39;ll be able to find one that <a data-i13n="cpos:1;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/computing/the-best-tech-gifts-and-gadgets-for-2025-140052015.html">makes a great gift</a> for anyone who you know loves these little building bricks. Black Friday Lego deals are what to look for this time of year, because you can typically save at least 20 percent on a good number of sets. Yes, that often includes the most popular ones from the Star Wars, Super Mario, Harry Potter and other collections. In general, we always recommend using a <a data-i13n="cpos:2;pos:1" href="https://camelcamelcamel.com/">price tracker</a> when determining if a Lego deal is in fact a good one. Below, we&#39;ve collected the best Lego Black Friday deals we could find right now.</p> 
<p>In general, we always recommend using a <a data-i13n="cpos:3;pos:1" href="https://camelcamelcamel.com/">price tracker</a> when determining if a Lego deal is in fact a good one. <p>While not a deal, arguably the hottest Lego for Black Friday will be the brand new <a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:LEGO;elmt:;cpos:8;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=70bceed8-b1ae-4af0-9fde-faa9258e1bc8&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=04961d2b-11c7-46ee-ad98-02c58e5cd3ae&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=LEGO&amp;linkText=Star+Trek+USS+Enterprise+set&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAARUtc9wUgmXIWwHjv3QmTF6WAd-Q_B4XT65oFUNHyfZZ&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.lego.com%2Fen-us%2Fproduct%2Fstar-trek-u-s-s-enterprise-ncc-1701-d-10356" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.lego.com/en-us/product/star-trek-u-s-s-enterprise-ncc-1701-d-10356">Star Trek USS Enterprise set</a>, which was <a data-i13n="cpos:9;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/entertainment/legos-star-trek-uss-enterprise-set-arrives-on-black-friday-173414532.html">announced</a> recently. It has a whopping 3,600 pieces and will be a must-have for any Star Trek fans. The set will be available starting November 28 for $400.</p>
